text: E'ina hu'negu antahiho! Babiloni vahe'mokizmi kaza osu havi anumzantamina, mago kna ne-eanki'na ana knama efore'ma hanige'na, zamazeri haviza hugahue. Ana hanuge'za maka ana mopafima nemaniza vahe'mo'za tusi zamagazegu hugahaze. Ana nehanageno ha' vahe'mo'za Babiloni vahe'ma zamahe frisaza vahe'mo'za traka hu'za mopafi umase emase hugahaze.
